pullRequest.title: ReactiveStreamsAdapters support for Single and Completable
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation:
ReactiveStreamsAdapters currently only supports Publisher type. Users
can manually convert from Single and Completable to Publisher, but this
isn't a streamlined approach.
Modifications:

Add conversion methods for Single and Completable to RS Publisher in
ReactiveStreamsAdapters

Result:
Direct conversions from all concurrent-api types to RS Publisher.

commit.message:
ReactiveStreamsAdapters support for Single and Completable

Motivation:
ReactiveStreamsAdapters currently only supports Publisher type. Users
can manually convert from Single and Completable to Publisher, but this
isn't a streamlined approach.

Modifications:
- Add conversion methods for Single and Completable to RS Publisher in
ReactiveStreamsAdapters

Result:
Direct conversions from all concurrent-api types to RS Publisher.

nodes.diffHunk: @@ -73,6 +80,54 @@ private ReactiveStreamsAdapters() { return new StToRsPublisher<>(source); } + /** + * Converts the passed {@link Single} to a + * Reactive Streams + * {@link org.reactivestreams.Publisher}. + * @param source {@link Single} to convert to a {@link org.reactivestreams.Publisher}. + * @param Type of items emitted from the {@code source} and the returned {@link org.reactivestreams.Publisher}. + * @return A {@link org.reactivestreams.Publisher} representation of the passed {@link Single}. + */ + public static org.reactivestreams.Publisher toReactiveStreamsPublisher(Single source) { + return toReactiveStreamsPublisher(source.toPublisher()); + } + + /** + * Converts the passed {@link SingleSource} to a + * Reactive Streams + * {@link org.reactivestreams.Publisher}. + * @param source {@link Single} to convert to a {@link org.reactivestreams.Publisher}. + * @param Type of items emitted from the {@code source} and the returned {@link org.reactivestreams.Publisher}. + * @return A {@link org.reactivestreams.Publisher} representation of the passed {@link SingleSource}. + */ + public static org.reactivestreams.Publisher toReactiveStreamsPublisher(SingleSource source) { + return toReactiveStreamsPublisher(fromSource(source).toPublisher()); + } + + /** + * Converts the passed {@link Completable} to a + * Reactive Streams + * {@link org.reactivestreams.Publisher}. + * @param source {@link Single} to convert to a {@link org.reactivestreams.Publisher}.
